Directions: In a bowl, combine pie filling, lemon juice and cinnamon; spoon into pastry shell.  In another bowl, combine the flour and brown sugar; cut in butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.  Stir in nuts, oats and coconut; sprinkle over pie filling.  Bake at 400 degrees F for 12-15 minutes or until topping is golden brown, covering edge of pastry with foil to prevent overbrowning if needed.  Cool on a wire rack before cutting.
